channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report I-2024100063
item.description:
Report I-2024100063

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-18T09:15:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-24
  • City: Hanover
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 09/24/2024 this shipment had hidden dangerous goods that were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the at the DHL BWI service centre, 1328 Charwood Rd, Hanover, MD 21076 Transportation by road confirmed. Shipment also contains UN3481 Lithium ion batteries contained in equipment Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Case Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 1.47 kg Amount in Package: 1 A7 kg Number in Shipment: 2

item.title: Report X-2024100899
item.description:
Report X-2024100899

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-17T09:14:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-04
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO SMOKING PACKAGE IN A MOOSE UNLOADING AT AI1. RESPONDED WITH FULL PPE, DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET. UPON ARRIVAL MADE THE DETERMINATION FROM OUTER MARKINGS THAT PACKAGE CONTAINED 2 FIRE EXTINGUISHERS. ANY RESIDUE WAS COMPLETLY COTAINED WITHIN THE PACKAGE AND THAT THERE WAS NO EXTERNAL LEAKAGE. CONTAINED IN A BAG AND SPILL TUB AND RETURNED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.
